greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = nextprime(n^2) - prevprime(n^2).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
example: 6^2=36 is immediately preceded and followed by 31 and 37, of which 6 is the difference.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 17 2000
